English: Kill the Golden Aibatt in dungeons and get drop bonuses!
Portuguese: Elimine o Aibaitt Dourado nas masmorras e ganhe bônus de drop!
+30% EXP quando é noite no jogo!

English: The sun is up, x1.3 EXP has ended...
Portuguese: O Sol está aqui, acabou o +30% EXP...

English: Complete Eggcellent's Meadow to get Pink Easter Eggs!
Portuguese: Complete o Campo Eggcelente para ganhar Ovos de Páscoa Rosa!

English: Destroy the stars in the night sky to obtain star fragments!
Portuguese: Destrua estrelas no céu da noite para obter fragmentos de estrela!

English: Night has come! The stars are coming out. Find them in the sky!
Portuguese: A noite está aqui! As estrelas estão aparecendo... Ache-as no céu!

English: Nighttime has passed, the stars are disappearing.
Portuguese: A noite terminou, as estrelas estão sumindo.

English: Spend fewer Dungeon Coins when taking on missions or entering dungeons!
Portuguese: Use menos Moedas de Masmorra ao realizar missões ou entrar em masmorras!

English: Flyff Universe is turning 1! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Portuguese: O FlyFF Universe completa 1 ano! Um enorme agradecimento a todos os jogadores que fizeram esse momento especial possível!

English: Log in each day for 40 minutes to receive rewards!
Portuguese: Conecte-se diariamente por 40 minutos e ganhe prêmios!

English: Reach new levels during the event period and receive rewards! Only on the Flyff World Championship server!
Portuguese: Alcance níveis mais altos durante o evento e ganhe prêmios! Exclusivo no servidor do Flyff World Championship!

English: Exchange FWC Gear with [FWC Manager] Ava to get more rewards!
Portuguese: Troque Itens FWC com a [Gerente FWC] Ava e ganhe mais recompensas!

English: The #bFlyff World Championship#nb is a global competition held until September 7th, 2023. Join this server with boosted EXP and Drops and compete for exceptional prizes!
Portuguese: O #bFlyff World Championship#nb é uma competição internacional que acontece até 7 de setembro de 2023. Participe deste servidor com experiência e drops aumentados para concorrer a prêmios incríveis!

English: Earn coins by defeating monsters or completing quests, then spend them at the Gacha Machine to receive exceptional rewards!
Portuguese: Consiga moedas ao derrotar monstros ou completar missões para o NPC da Máquina Gacha e receba prêmios incríveis!

English: Collect Music Notes and Music Score Scrolls from monsters and exchange them with Bach.
Portuguese: Recolha Notas Musicais e Rolos de Partituras de monstros e troque com o NPC Bach
Solte fragmentos de pedras de melhoria!

English: Player Survey! Aim for special rewards!
Portuguese: Pesquisa de Jogadores! Alcance recompensas especiais!

English: It's been a bumper year, so there are a lot of monsters out to get crops.\nIt's time to hunt them down! Can you help?
Portuguese: Este ano foi abundante, então há muitos monstros atrás das colheitas.\nÉ hora de caçá-los! Você pode ajudar?
+20% no Drop de Chefes de Masmorras!

English: 1.3 Update Survey! Aim for special rewards!
Portuguese: 1.3 Atualização da Enquete! Concorra a recompensas especiais!

English: Exchange letters with a loved one or friend to complete the phrases below!
Portuguese: Troque cartas com alguém especial ou um amigo para completar as frases abaixo!!!

English: Let's celebrate the 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!
Portuguese: Let's celebrate the 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!

English: Flyff Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Portuguese: Flyff Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!

English: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon to earn a permanent costume!
Portuguese: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon to earn a permanent costume!

English: Complete Daily Quests to earn dice, then roll them for rewards!
Portuguese: Complete Daily Quests to earn dice, then roll them for rewards!

English: Plunder treasure from the Pirate Ship!
Portuguese: Plunder treasure from the Pirate Ship!

English: Log in each day for 30 minutes to receive rewards!
Portuguese: Log in each day for 30 minutes to receive rewards!

English: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!
Portuguese: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!
Portuguese: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase all life mastery gains by 20%!
Portuguese: Increase all life mastery gains by 20%!

English: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!
Portuguese: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!

English: Increase your life production speed by 20%!
Portuguese: Increase your life production speed by 20%!

English: Reduces durability cost by 1 when gathering!
Portuguese: Reduces durability cost by 1 when gathering!

English: Life Wandering Merchant Early Refresh Event!
Portuguese: Life Wandering Merchant Early Refresh Event!

English: The Wandering Merchant's inventory refreshes 30 minutes earlier during the event!
Portuguese: The Wandering Merchant's inventory refreshes 30 minutes earlier during the event!

English: 20% more gathering objects spawn during the event!
Portuguese: 20% more gathering objects spawn during the event!

English: Life Wandering Merchant Extra Stock Event!
Portuguese: Life Wandering Merchant Extra Stock Event!

English: The Wandering Merchant offers 2 additional items for sale during the event!
Portuguese: The Wandering Merchant offers 2 additional items for sale during the event!

English: Successfully upgrade an item to each level from +1 to +10 during the event to receive rewards. Complete all 10 stages to receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.
Portuguese: Successfully upgrade an item to each level from +1 to +10 during the event to receive rewards. Complete all 10 stages to receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.

English: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the Discord for more information.
Portuguese: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the Discord for more information.

English: During the 2026 Valentine's Day Event, I♥YOU items can be obtained from the Valentine's Day Letter, which drops from defeated monsters; only monsters up to 10 levels below your character's level are eligible to drop the item.
Portuguese: During the 2026 Valentine's Day Event, I♥YOU items can be obtained from the Valentine's Day Letter, which drops from defeated monsters; only monsters up to 10 levels below your character's level are eligible to drop the item.
